documentation.label: Set context value
documentation.description: Set a value to a context variable

documentation.label: Input Value
documentation.description: Value to set in the context

documentation.label: Output Value
documentation.description: Output value to set it to

documentation.label: Set value
documentation.description: Set a value to a field

documentation.label: Data space
documentation.description: The data space where the value to set is located

documentation.label: Data set
documentation.description: The data set where the value to set is located

documentation.label: XPath
documentation.description: XPath to the record where the value to set is located

documentation.label: Path
documentation.description: Path to the field to set

documentation.label: Value
documentation.description: Value to set in the selected field

documentation.label: Set Context from Record value
documentation.description: Extract a value from a record field and assign it to a Data Context output

documentation.label: Data space
documentation.description: The data space where the value to set is located

documentation.label: Data set
documentation.description: The data set where the value to set is located

documentation.label: Record XPath
documentation.description: XPath to the record containing the value to extract

documentation.label: XPath to Field within Record
documentation.description: XPath within the record to the field containing the value

documentation.label: Output Value
documentation.description: Value to set in the selected field

documentation.label: Launch a Workflow
documentation.description: Create a process instance of a given publication

documentation.label: Workflow publication
documentation.description: Workflow publication to launch

documentation.label: Predicate is true?
documentation.description: Test if a XPath predicate is true

documentation.label: Data space
documentation.description: The data space where to apply the predicate

documentation.label: Data set
documentation.description: The data where to apply the predicate

documentation.label: XPath
documentation.description: XPath to the record where to apply the predicate

documentation.label: Predicate
documentation.description: Predicate to test

documentation.label: Does Data Space Contain Certain Changes?
documentation.description: This is a condition that checks if any changes have occurred in a data space. Can check at either a data set, table, or record level.

documentation.label: Data space
documentation.description: The data space to be checked

documentation.label: Data set
documentation.description: The data set to be checked

documentation.label: Table XPath
documentation.description: the table to be checked (optional)

documentation.label: Record XPath
documentation.description: the record to be checked (optional)
